body_html: Is there a libcuda.so in the Docker image? I have seen cases where the image has a libcuda.so from a CUDA installation, but the Kubernetes node had a mix of libraries from the Linux driver installation (e.g. 367.48 vs 367.57 or 375.66).
body_text: Is there a libcuda.so in the Docker image? I have seen cases where the image has a libcuda.so from a CUDA installation, but the Kubernetes node had a mix of libraries from the Linux driver installation (e.g. 367.48 vs 367.57 or 375.66).
body: Is there a libcuda.so in the Docker image? I have seen cases where the image has a libcuda.so from a CUDA installation, but the Kubernetes node had a mix of libraries from the Linux driver installation (e.g. 367.48 vs 367.57 or 375.66).
